name: Cirno's Lost Chirumiru
description: Cirno was chilling with her Chirumiru, after drinking one, she goes to grab another and she realizes they are all gone. She takes it upon herself to get all her Chirumiru back and to find out who stole them.

name: Rezzil Player: Wolves Team Pack
description: Upgrade your experience with the official Wolves FC Team Pack. Play Heading Drills in the Molineux Stadium and pick from a selection of exclusive kit from this epic club.

name: Duke Nukem Forever: Restoration Project
description: The DNF2001 Restoration Project was created roughly a day or two after the August 21, 2001 and October 26, 2001 versions of Duke Nukem Forever; dated a whole 10 years before the release of the final game, were leaked by x0r_jmp on the /v/ board of 4chan. This resulted in a flurry of renewed interest in Duke and the game itself; and quickly attracted both vets and new blood alike interested in modifying the game's source code.

name: Lula na Rampa
description: Lula na Rampa is a 3D runner where you must help the Brazilian President-elect Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva dodge the bolsominions and receive the presidential sash, developed by his grandson under the pseudonym ThicosGroove.

name: Microgames Jam Pak
description:
The result of the Gameboy Microgames Jam from November of 2022, Microgames Jam Pak is every WarioWario-style microgame combined together into a symbol game for the original Gameboy.

Play 20 original microgames made by the community, and compete to get the highest score.

name: Endzeit
description: Endzeit is a German RPG-Maker game by Real Troll and is a humorous take on the third world war, set in an alternate history, where said world war takes place in 1969.

name: Ice Nosfe
description: Help the Van Helsing brothers defeat Nosfe in the lands of Transylvania. Use the freeze rifle to defeat the bosses in each dungeon. 10 dungeons await you guarded by Nosfe and his hosts. NES or Commodore style. Solo and cooperative.

name: Hide Time
description: Hide Time is a puzzle based game with horror elements, telling a story about the closed for good toys store. Explore the abandoned toy store and try to find a safe place and collect supplies to stay alive! The toys will try to kill you! Will you survive in this scary world controlled by living toys?

name: Mysterious Lab
description: A Rouge like game which the player will explore an abandoned Lab. During which, player will fight with zombles and pick up supplyments to strengthen their weapons.

name: I am Sakuya: Touhou FPS Game - Reimu
description: Continue the adventures from I Am Sakuya with the Reimu expansion pack! Features a whole new character to play as, complete with new weapons, enemies, maps and more!

name: Vega
description: Vega is a fascinating pixel-art style quest. Young Mary - the protagonist of the game, running away from her pursuers, loses consciousness, and wakes up in a completely different place. Infinite, but as if asleep city, from which at first glance there is no way out. What to do?

name: Don't Steal My Christmas!
description: Don't Steal My Christmas! is a game that shows that all creatures want to celebrate Christmas in warmth and comfort. Fight against your friend for the side of people or Christmas monsters.

name: Eternal Dragons
description:
Eternal Dragons is the next step in gaming. Create and explore a world of dragons, and collect and breed new powerful combinations. Earn unique rewards and incentives, build their own stories and make your mark in gaming history.

Eternal Dragons offers an environment where players truly own their assets, and the gaming universe is decentralized, secure, and always running.

name: Super Hoopers
description: Super Hoopers is a basketball-themed game featuring three playable characters where their purpose is to carefully aim and throw the ball in order to score awesome basketball trick shots. Watch out for the obstacles and enemies that might interfere in your way and beat all the available levels!

name: Ballads and Romances
description: Investigate the origins of the literary debut of Adam Mickiewicz, a XIX century-famous Polish poet. In an immersive visual novel, discover the secret of his love, friendship, and artistic inspirations!

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Re-Revenge
description: Welcome to the universe of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Re-revenge of the Shredder! The city was attacked by a foot ninja army led by Shredder and Krang. Our brave heroes have come together to challenge them and clear the city of evil mutants and foot ninja. But will it be that easy?

name: Sol Cresta: Legendary Fighters DLC Set
description:
Legendary fighters from the Cresta series are back and yours to maneuver as you try and stop Mega Zofer’s conquest of the solar system.

Installing this Legendary Fighters DLC Set will add 3 new fighters to the base game.

name: Sol Cresta: CR47
description:
Legendary fighters from the CRESTA series are back and yours to maneuver as you try and stop Mega Zofer’s conquest of the solar system.

Installing this DLC will add the new CR47 fighter to the base game.

name: Sol Cresta: Wing Galiber
description: Installing this DLC will add the new Wing Galiber fighter to the base game.

name: Sol Cresta: Wing Galiber II
description:
Enrich your Sol Cresta experience as you pilot new fighters in this DLC.
Legendary fighters from the Cresta series are back and yours to maneuver as you try and stop Mega Zofer’s conquest of the solar system.

name: Ornamental
description: Christmas themed daily puzzle game for the Playdate.

name: Ao Oni 3D
description: Unreal Engine 5 Remake of the "Ao Oni" RPG maker game.

name: Super Mario Bros: Merry Mountain Christmas Adventure - SMW Christmas Edition V3.0
description: Super Mario World rom hack with a Christmas theme!

name: The Golf G
description: Dribble the ball to become the best golf player in the world.

name: Ships Simulator
description: Take control over 3 special purpose naval vessels. Complete various missions on dangerous waters of Baltic Sea. Take part in recovery of objects from the bottom of the sea. Transport heavy cargo to its final destination, also including rescue and transport missions.

name: Planet Collision
description: Drag to move the planets and release to drop them. Try to get larger planets, but be careful not to let them pass the black line!

name: Mia's Christmas 2
description: Mia's back this Christmas to decorate her Christmas garden party. Contains new level shapes, items, patterns, swapping and merging in this deceptively simple, increasingly difficult puzzle game.

name: Cabbagers
description: Cabbagers is a multiplayer combat game with a crazy humor.

name: Santa's Gifts
description: Ho, ho, ho! It feels better that the winter holidays are approaching. Have you been dutiful this year? Are you ready to help Santa? Clear his way so that he can make all children happy this year too, besides, what else is magic for? It's not so hard, just put your brain on and help Santa! Merry Christmas everyone!

name: The Iron Union
description: Greetings tank commander,and welcome to the《The Iron Union》.In this game,you will prove yourself by using your tanks to break though the blockade,and eliminate all your enemy.

name: Divine Adventure: Act One
description: Step into a large and magical world where you rule not one but two universes. Fight evil, save evil or be evil. What you choose to do defines your character in this text based RPG.

name: Waifu Fighter
description: One day, women became very powerful and dominated all fighting arenas. You had been living in seclusion for training for twenty years. You aimed at the championship of martial arts. Encountering female fighters all over the world, you had to do your best to defeat them successfully!

name: Sail Forth
description: Heave! Fake the bull rope and stay the mizzen royal! Command a fleet of custom-rigged sailing ships on a procedurally crafted adventure over an unending ocean whose ancient depths have swallowed the key to a planet’s mysterious past. The Deepblue calls with the bellow of High Adventure! Sail Forth!

name: War Thunder: J-7D Pack
Plasmorphosis
description: Help a plucky rover complete its planetary research mission by studying alien lifeforms... and morphing them into brand new shapes and forms!

name: War Thunder: MiG-21bis "Lazur-M" Pack
War Thunder: Saab J35XS Pack
War Thunder: MiG-23ML Pack
War Thunder: Kfir Canard Pack
Empire of the Golden Witch
description: An Umineko fangame. Dig through records to uncover the truth of a very different Ushiromiya family.

name: Fun Chess
description: Sin descripción

name: My Mystic Secretary
description: Otome game by Lumiere Entertainment.

name: Home Design Makeover
description: Sin descripción

name: Psychosis
description: Fight against demons and your own mind to save yourself from a never-ending hell in this retro-style survival-horror game about mystery, psychology, and the coldness of killing. Banish demons with deadly weapons and reassemble the mysterious pieces of a family gone missing in Psychosis.

name: Escape!!
description: Escape!! is an endless runner through a haunted forest. Jump, slide, kick and close your eyes to survive. Beautiful handmade pixel art, with frightening monsters and a terrified survivor.

name: Don't Remember
description: In Don’t Remember, some things are better left forgotten. Fight your amnesia in this atmospheric, first person psychological horror game. Solve the mystery of the old mansion in 1900’s England through the use of your lantern’s various colors and face its hidden grotesque visage.

name: Poly Memory: Animals
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal memory game with animals.

name: Soccer Clubs
description: Soccer Clubs Football Manager is a football e-sports game authorized by FIFPro. The game has IP authorization for more than 60000 professional players from more than 54 countries around the world, including Cristiano Ronaldo, Messi, Mbape and so on, creating a luxury football feast for players.

name: TinyTiny
description: "Be a hero to save the Tiny Kingdom from crisis!" Experience a variety of exciting VR games!

name: Golem Builder
description: Golem Builder is a strategy game where you build a golem to be the best of them all! Build and upgrade your golem with lots of different parts. Ate you ready to become the best of them all?

name: Ridge Racer 2
description: Ridge Racer 2, originally released on the PSP, enhanced for PS4/PS5 with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Portrait of Ruin: Refined Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hanabi Zekkei
description: Hanabi Zekkei is based off a real Japanese slot machine, emulated to run on mobile.

name: Afterplace
description:
Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path.

Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, or use two thumbs like a traditional controller. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket.

name: Dumb Ways to Draw 2
description: Grab your trusty magical pen - it’s up to you to save your favorite Dumb Ways to Die Characters including Numpty, Numpty, Botch, Stumble, Putz, Numskull, Lax, Mishap, and more!

name: Heaven's Door
description: The gates of heaven will only be open to those who prove that they deserve their place in it. Prove your goodness by answering all of the angel's questions right.

name: Rumbleverse: Holiday Demon Pack
description: It's that time of year again! Celebrate the Festival of Fights, Grapital City style! The Rumbleverse Holiday Demon pack includes the Holiday Demon set & 1,000 Brawlla Bills.

name: Goblin Slayer: Endless Hunting
description: Goblin Slayer: Endless Hunting is a web browser RPG based on the dark fantasy light novel series Goblin Slayer. Team up to defeat a variety of monsters in this easy-to-play auto-battler.

name: Driving Home
description: Driving Home is a short indie horror game, where you drive home after working late and you realize you forgot to refuel your car.

name: MuseSwipr
description: A rhythm game where you swipe between two lanes to the beat. Form your own flow and unleash your greatest swiping performance.

name: Fallen Kingdom
description: The Fallen Kingdom is under attack and YOU must save it! Explore a massive universe and defeat a mysterious evil -- collect unique spells, tame adorable pets, face 15 massive bosses, and complete magical puzzles as you become the next ruler of the world.

name: Pinball Heroes
description: Experience Pinball Heroes originally released on the PSP system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters. Enjoy some frantic ball flippin’ fun with addictive gameplay, simple controls and unique pinball tables.

name: The Punchuin
description: You are on a quest to solve the mystery of the treasure of Punch Mountain. Punch your way down, collect money and diamonds, improve your punching skills and make some new friends along the way.

name: Disaster Band
description:
Let's get the party started! Play solo or connect with your friends, pick a track, choose your instrument and start playing. The fun never stops: Import your own tracks and prove that you and your buddies are not going down in history as the ultimate Disaster Band.

With the creative freedom to play any note at any time, you can practice and improvise in absolutely every song while you explore the music. Don't forget: Practice makes Perfect. And of course, perfection leads to higher scores. But where is the fun in that? With Disaster Band's dynamic sound engine even playing the wrong notes leads to neverending fun and entertainment.

name: Tinykin Challenge Update
description: The world of Tinykin just got a lil’ bigger with new Time Attack Challenges! Find your new hornet friends Mach & Dash using your AR glasses to join the tiny racing buzz, & win medals to collect sweet prizes!

name: From the Rain
description: From The Rain is a single player survival horror game. Reboot the generator, lock all entrances, and defend yourself from the entities that lurk in the rain. Survive each hour and wait for help to arrive!

name: Ravage Road
description: Ravage Road is an indie tower defense game with deckbuilding and roguelike elements that allows the players to control and build out the road they must defend using placed tiles in addition to building towers from cards in their deck.

name: Gensmak!
description: A fresh take on trivia that's actually new, with strategy needed to win, hints by comedians, and questions for every generation. Inspired by the popularity and fun of the original Gensmak trivia card game, Gensmak digital is a standalone digital game that can be played IRL or virtually with people around the world.

name: Mind Jab
description: Sanity is a win condition.

name: Death by Begonia
description: Death by Begonia is a surreal LGBTQ+ Southern gothic murder mystery. Follow Riley's attempts to reconnect with old childhood friends in a town haunted by annual serial murders. Will you fall in love and unlock the mysteries hidden in your friends' hearts? Or will you die trying?

name: Luna & Monsters TD: The Deprived Magical Kingdom
description: This is the story of a world-traveling black cat named Luna and vicious monsters! Increase your population and intercept your enemies! The ultimate addicting trial-and-error game is born! A full-fledged tower defense game from ‘’Luna's Tail Creative LLC‘’!

name: ThanksKilling Day
description:
The boy, who was about to celebrate Thanksgiving Day with his family, finds himself stuck in a house with a dangerous stranger who seems to be responsible for his parent's disappearance.

A bleak, cold, and dark night was certainly the perfect setting for the sinister events, that you will be forced to witness for yourself!

Run, Hide, Solve Survive!

Featuring an incredible voice cast including Doug Cockle (Geralt from the Witcher series), Sandy Johnson (1978's Halloween), Christopher Murray (twin peaks, parks and rec), CinnamonToastKen (Professional Youtuber) & many more!

name: Street volleyball: Invitation
description: Play volleyball matches with different players from different regions. Use you ability and find a way to defeat the opponent. Only with skill and quick reflexes can you beat them and become a champion.

name: Blessed Work
description: A new work appears, but for some reason the lack of security is everywhere, place objects, activate buttons, move things and do everything in your power to prevent your workers from dying trying to finish the construction in this lemmings-style game!

name: Super Lesbian Animal RPG
description: Melody has decided to become a healer in this classic-inspired turn-based RPG about love, anxiety, and fighting funny-looking monsters in dungeons.

name: Project Apocalypse
description: Build a post-apocalyptic city and protect it from the infected. Survive.

name: Ricky Recharge
description: Ricky wakes up all alone in a robot apocalypse. Little did they know that this was exactly what he had been waiting for! Charge, zap, blast, and recharge your way through an ever growing army of bots in this high score focused arcade shooter!

name: Square Farm
description: Sin descripción

name: Casio Handheld Games CG-5X emulator for ZX Spectrum
description:
This game is an emulator for 3 of Casio's CG-5X series of solar handheld games from the years 1983-84:

* Marine Hunter CG-50

* Dandy Cowboy CG-51

* Mole Hunter CG-53

name: Didaskalia
description: It's year 1989, you are tired of your life, everything and everyone pisses you off. One day you decide to join the army, as a combat medic. You and your companions are sent to "Phobos". The mission is to get rid of the monsters that took control of the planet. You arrive a bit late, because you had some work to do. Every soldier brutally dies, you are left all alone. You hear in the radio that people from earth have sent help to rescue you. But soon it turns out that they want you DEAD.

name: Metroid: Another Legend
description: A romhack for Metroid: Zero Mission around 4 hours long

name: Crash-San
description: Crash-San destroys the spirit. Use jumps and guns to get the treasure before the spirit is destroyed.Action game.Aim for the goal with limited life.Three different stages await you.Each stage has traps to make you suffer.

name: Students of Light Bonds: Typing RPG with Character Creation
description: "Thank you!", "Became CEO!", "There is always next chance!" Combined cheerful positive words typing and RPG with character creation system for all party members! English translated texts and romanization examples are available for non-Japanese players. Let's defeat enemies with your own characters!

name: Sakura Gym Girls
description: Shouhei is an average man who works at a second-hand bookshop with his sweet, shy colleague, Asa. His life is unremarkable, until Asa suggests that they join their local gym. There, Shouhei meets two attractive women, and his love life begins to look up.

name: SokoMelody
description: Solve puzzles in this old school style Sokoban, and help the composers with their songs.

name: Crowd Medieval City War
description: Fight with medieval soldiers in a fantastic city.

name: I Love Finding Birds
description: Your new feathered friends are taking you to the sky!

name: Chai
description: Chai is the digital adaptation of the card game of the same name created by Dan and Connie Kazmaier developed by "Steeped Games". It can be played with 1-5 players.

name: Silence in the Cabin
description: "Silence in the Cabin" is an Open Map Survival Horror Game, where you must survive Dark linear story sections in order to unlock more areas of the world.

name: Hentai CyberGirl
description: Hentai CyberGirl is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of future cyber girl and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: In the Building: Cats 2
description: is a game in which you have to find all the cute cats. Cats will hide in all houses. Come into the house and search every corner of the room, move the pillows, open the nightstands, check the toilet... Cats can hide in the most unpredictable places.

name: Alexios the Protector
description: Only you can save the world from Xor's evil plans... Go on an adventure, become stronger and thwart the plans of evil.

name: Sky Goddess Remaking
description: "Sky Goddess Remaking" is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game with nostalgic movie images. In the game, players will control different aircraft to fight in the air.

name: The Legend of Zelda: A New Light
description: This hack provides a new quest for the Legend of Zelda (NES). It changes many parts of the game while staying true to the original. It features brand new graphics and new dungeons. All level entrances have been relocated, secrets in the overworld are moved, and there are many overworld surprises.

name: EmoteGuesser
description: EmoteGuesser is a very simple game about guessing 7TV Emotes from a specified Twitch channel! It's more challenging than it sounds, but you'll have to check it out yourself!

name: Hover League
description:
Welcome to Hover League - compete with people all around the world, in a new unique track every day!
Fine-tune your racing lines to achieve the best possible time, and make your way up the Leagues!

name: Kitten's Head Football: Christmas
description:
Santa is busy today, he is preparing new content for the Kitten’s Head Football. Get ready for the pack of amazing costumes, beautiful locations and winter atmosphere.

Winter is here, so this is the time to get new costumes for these cutie fellows. In this pack you will get: 9 headwear, 9 costumes, 7 locations and 5 balls.

name: Knights & Guns: Expansion Packs Collection
description:
It includes:
- Knights & Guns Expansion Pack #1
- Knights & Guns Expansion Pack #2

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Extended Edition
description: Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the premade templates or create YOUR OWN kawaii illustrations.

name: Little Kong: Jungle Fun - Ultimate Edition
description: Kong got himself dirty while enjoying a mango. His mom tries to force him to bathe but he's got other plans... That is to run away as far as possible. This Bundle includes the Orange DLC.

name: NASCAR Rivals: Throwback Pack
description: The NASCAR Rivals Throwback Pack includes 30 alternate schemes from the 2022 NASCAR Cup Series season, mostly featuring the throwback schemes used in the Goodyear 400 at Darlington Raceway. Plus the addition of Jacques Villeneuve and legendary drivers Matt Kenseth and Bobby Labonte. Players will also receive five new and unique Challenges, inspired by real-life events that took place during the 2022 NASCAR Cup Series season.

name: Fight Club: Join us if you can
description: The fight club is a select secret group in which everyone wants to enter, but you will have to prove that you are worthy. Answer the questions of its members right without failing.

name: Party Party Time
description:
It's time to get this party started!
Endless fun in a bash everyone can join!

name: Them's Fightin' Herds: Texas
description:
The 8th character to join the TFH roster is Texas the Bull, a big-body grappler who's smashing records on size and power!

Note: This item requires the base game (sold separately) to be used.

name: X-Blades HD Gold
description:
X-Blades HD Gold includes:

- X-Blades HD
- X-Blades OST
- X-Blades Digital Deluxe DLC

name: X-Blades HD
description: The all new X-Blades HD version features updated graphics and wide-screen compatibility, as well as newly rendered and post processed cutscenes in Full HD.

name: Monopoly Madness: Dino City
description: Become the most famous real estate mogul of Dino City in the new Monopoly Madness DLC!

name: Floppy Knights: Version 2.0
description: Adds new playable characters, new story and challenge levels, as well as new cards and some assist mode options.

name: Mortal Shell: Complete Edition
description:
For the first time, Mortal Shell: Complete Edition brings together all content updates and DLC into one formidable package.

Included in Mortal Shell: Complete Edition is the game-altering Virtuous Cycle expansion - an entirely new roguelike mode that brings random and repeatable savagery to Fallgrim.

Also present is Hadern, once your elusive teacher, now yours to master as Mortal Shell’s fifth possessable and playable character.

Mortal Shell: Complete Edition also features the Rotten Autumn content update, which adds unique Shell shades, a new mini-quest, a powerful new photo mode, and an alternative boss fight soundtrack from black metal band Rotting Christ.

name: AngelKnights
description:
A dark shadow that emerged along with the missing goddess Lea.
Become a hero of Angel Knights and rescue the world from an age of chaos.

name: Magma
description: Frantic action and challenging foe all the way in this twin stick, bullet hell, rogue inspired, 16-bit 90's themed retro shooter!

name: Mermaidio 3
description: Mermaidio is relaxing 2D runner. Swim through the dangerous underwater world. Avoid or defeat enemies and collect lots of points! Watch out for sharks!

name: Spirit Slider
description:
Spirit Slider features five sliding puzzle games.
Each puzzle game consist of 27 game pieces that have the ability to slide anywhere within a 3 x 3 x 3 grid.

name: Super Psycho Baseball
description: Welcome to Super Psycho Baseball, a sadistic home-run hitting roguelike in which you try to conquer a gang of pitch-slinging bosses, each more psychotic than the last. Come face five fully-realized pitchers, rack up powerups, and reach the top!

name: Master of Ski
description: It's time to do some sports!

name: Obscene Mansion
description: Obscene Mansion is an erotic detective story with elements of adventure. Reveal the secrets of the mansion and put the souls of the harlots to rest.

name: Rolling Rush
description: Rolling Rush is a time attack singleplayer game where you can challenge yourself on desert , ice amongst other tracks. Competing with other players through worldwide leaderboards , may the marble roll in your favor.

name: Can Gym Break This?
description: Competition with yourself will improve your power, memory, and ideas to achieve big things in life. It will make you healthy and with health, you can achieve anything in life. The beautiful environment will give you the pleasure to play the game and try the different modes (Day, Night).

name: Geometric Sniper Z
description: A 2D sniper game with zombies like you've never seen! Get ready to blow some heads and good hunting!

name: Coffee Shop Tycoon
description: Coffee Shop Tycoon is a management game in which you take control of your own coffee shop. Will you thrive and become a popular coffee shop or die trying? Everything lies in your hands.

name: Tomte Trouble
description: Tomte Trouble is a single-screen platformer for the Game Boy Color. Collect all of the tomte and progress through sixteen bite-sized stages.

name: John Wheel Memorial
description: Sin descripción

name: Blood Orange
description:
Searching the Amazon for the elusive razorback dolphin, Nora discovers more than she bargained for.

Created in one month for Thalassophobia game jam.

name: Penelope
description: Penelope.wad is a sort of bookend to my first year of mapping, and a distilled extract of everything I like in my mapping soup: complex architecture, out-there texturing, strange progression and a whole lot of atmosphere. There are also a few demons to kill, but nothing worrisome - little more than a nuisance. Only a few are archviles, and even fewer are cyberdemons and spider masterminds. Most combat is optional, and the exit can be reached in only a few minutes, though I'd invite you to stay for the whole experience if you will...

name: Break Point
description: Welcome to Break Point, a 9-map Doom II UDMF episode featuring colorful 3D environments from some of the best and brightest of modern GZDoom mappers.

name: Sex Simulator: The Cabin
description: An interactive sex simulation game, featuring realistic high definition graphics and characters. You play the role a guy in a luxurious cabin with 3 gorgeous women.

name: Alien Prison Escape
description: Jason has found himself in prison and recognizes that prison life isn't cut out for him. Luckily, an alien crashes into his cell with an offer. Help the alien fix his spaceship and it'll help you escape.

name: Static Shift Racing
description: Modify your car, choose from an endless assortment of customization options, then take your ride to the streets to prove your metal on the pavement. Verse real players in an open world made for racing!

name: Sig
description:
In Sig, players are thrust into a dystopian future where humanity is on the brink of extinction. As a top-down shooter dungeon crawler, the game combines fast-paced combat with exploration and discovery. Players must navigate through a series of challenging levels and uncover the source of the existential threat facing humanity.
Along the way, they will discover secrets about their own identity and the world they inhabit.
Can you save humanity and unravel the mysteries of Sig?

name: Project: Summer Ice - Pinball: Pammy
description: A game in the "Project: Summer Ice" series! This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: ZJ the Ball: Special
description: A game in the "ZJ the Ball" series! This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: White Mourning: Museum In Pale
description: White Mourning: Museum In Pale is a fan game of Disco Elysium, based on White Mourning (the DE fanart book). You can wander around as a pixel RPG character. Meet with familiar people, review your familiar past, and collect all kinds of artwork.

name: Miss Neko 3
description: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the psychedelic city — Neko City#96572! All good things you want will happen here! Just dance with the charming neko, solve their match puzzles, and you will get mysterious rewards!

name: Combat Master: Season 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Cross Verbix
description: Sin descripción

name: Bug×Bug
description:
The main character, Gumi, a small streamer, is often high thanks to drinking alcohol and taking drugs.
He makes fun of creators who were even smaller than him.
Gumi is aware that he is a total scumbag, but he just can't quit.
――There is only one person who could accept him even though he is a piece of trash.

A short BL game about two faulty vloggers.

name: One Night
description: Escape from the anime girls.

name: Terrestial
description: A science fiction action game that features multiple stages with different gameplay for each stage.

name: Tokyo Pinball
description: A retro high-speed action game in which you can compete with your friends.

name: Garden
description: Garden is a casual mobile game in which players plant multiple types of plants that generate sounds. Each plant generates a different sound, and by planting various plants, players can compose their own musical garden. The project is a harmonious blend of visual art and music.

name: Super Mario Odyssey: 2D Mario in 3D!
description: Super Mario Odyssey: 2D Mario in 3D! is a mod for Super Mario Odyssey which changes Mario's 3D state into his 2D state while still existing in a 3D plain.

name: Parkour Annovation: Unreal Edition
description: Parkour Annovation is a game that shallenges you to traverse obstacles in a dynamic and realists environment using parkour skills such as running jumping climbing You san explore different locations from urban landscapes to natural settings, and face various challenges that rest your speed agility and creativity Parkour Annovation is a same that lets you experience the thrill and freedom of parkour in a virtual world

name: Outpath: First Journey
description: Outpath: First Journey is a prologue chapter of the main game, Outpath. An experimental clicker base building game. Craft, gather & manage resources, build your base and buy more islands to exploit and expand!

name: Crystal Winter
description: Naoki was really excited about spending Christmas with his beloved. But those plans weren't meant to be - Naoki saw her hugging another guy. Christmas seems ruined but just one random encounter can change everything. This is a Japanese-style kinetic visual novel about Christmas.

name: Ink Bunny
description: Relaxing puzzle game with ink bunnies.

name: Poly Puzzle: Animals
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal puzzle game with animals.

name: Crochet Cavalcade
description: Crochet Cavalcade is an adult visual novel series, with an expansive cast of characters and unique scenarios! Chapters will be published frequently, and each new story adds another intertwining link into the ever developing world!

name: Chubby Cat 2
description: A fat cat who loves to eat all day is back now in this game even better than the first! Cut the wool yarn precisely to feed this lazy cat. This game is suitable for all age groups. You will have a lot of fun!

name: The Curse of The Wise Tree
description: Your task is to collect mushrooms that grow along the forest path. It would seem that everything is simple, but there are rumors that evil spirits in the form of MEMES are found in the forest. Therefore, you should look at both. Good luck!

name: Spy x Family Tamagotchi
description: The Spy x Family Tamagotchi is an licensed Tamagotchi Nano based on the anime and manga series Spy × Family.

name: The Chicken Game
description:
This is not your parents' chicken farming simulator. Granted, they probably didn't have a chicken farming simulator, but still!

Starting your journey as a humble farmer, you will improve and expand, unlocking and rediscovering the long lost secrets to the chicken genome. What secrets might you ask? Polka dots. And rainbow stripes. And super speed. Design your own farm, collect your crops, and create new and unique chickens in this indie pixel-art game.

name: The Elephant E
description: The clicking adventure you and your friends need. Eat grass with the main hero of the game The Elephant E and eat all the grass in the world!

name: Quiz Thiz United Kingdom: Bronze Edition
description: Answer questions about the United Kingdom and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about the UK while playing!

name: The Jumping Cookie: Turbo
description: Join Big C on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Stroke the Cow
description:
Those that live out in the country know what cows are, they have probably seen one before. For those living in the cities, they are but a fantasy, a fleeting dream to see one that will most likely never be realised.

Now that dream can come to your big screen. Stroke the cow.

name: Dark Siren
description: Be careful not to be captured by the Dark Siren, find the note left by the sailors, uncover the truth, and escape.

name: Mushrooman
description: Indie horror about giant killer mushrooms.

name: The Slothgate Experiment
description: The Creature Zone Returns In An Unexpected Way… The Slothgate Experiment is a physics-heavy vr game that takes place in Los Angeles, California, where Oliver Franklin has recently moved into an apartment. He is captured and taken to slothgate two weeks after he gets a job at a warehouse.

name: Ariel's Daily Grind
description: After falling miserably into debt, Ariel summons her resolve and starts working jobs to grind her way out of financial ruin.

name: Antimatter Dimensions
description: Earn antimatter through dimensions! Gain Infinite antimatter to collapse the universe!

name: Wings of the Universe
description: Wings of The Universe (WoTU) is a free-to-play 2D indie space action MMORPG top-down game developed by a single programmer. WoTU is designed to be co-op heavy, but even a lone wolf can survive with his skills and have fun.

name: Duelyst II
description: Choose your faction, construct your deck and put your strategy to the test in the evolution of the ultimate collectible tactics game.

name: X-Plane 12
description: X-Plane 12 is the world’s most comprehensive and powerful flight simulator for personal computers, and it offers the most realistic flight model available. X-Plane is not a game, but an engineering tool that can be used to predict the flying qualities of fixed- and rotary-wing aircraft with incredible accuracy.

name: Manny Boxing VR
description: Realistic physics, immersive sound, and fluid animation make you feel like you’re really in the Boxing ring. With physics designed to be as real as ever achieved in a Boxing simulator, you will forget you are in VR environment. Enjoy boxing with world-renowned boxing star, Manny Pacquiao!

name: SCP: Keter
description: Based on the SCP Foundation "SCP: Keter" is a combination of Tactical Multiplayer FPS paired with Dead by Daylight and Left 4 Dead-inspired Game mechanics.

name: Bottler3000
description: The world is plaqued with plastic. Play this game to show your support to make the earth a cleaner place.

name: Pixel Happy Game Girls
description: In this cute visual novel: Your childhood friend Masako invites you to work at her indie game studio, and help accomplish her dreams. You soon learn that making a game is harder than it sounds.

name: DCS World: F/A-18C Rise of the Persian Lion II Campaign by Badger 633
description: As staccato shafts of burning light flashed by the canopy, Lieutenant Scott Rivers, call sign 'Ford', squeezed the release button. He felt the expected "kick in the pants" as the Hornet surged when a ton of self-guiding ordinance dropped away intent on finding its mark. Below, seconds later, there was a massive shock wave as the area where the I.R.G.C. meeting was being held, exploded into ‘Hell on earth’ lighting up the entire City.

name: DCS World: Black Shark 3
description: DCS: Black Shark 3 is a further development of the well-known Black Shark and Black Shark 2 projects, which are dedicated to the Russian Ka-50 attack helicopter.

name: Siege of Shadowdale: Enhanced Edition
description: A remaster of the classic Hall of Fame module for Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition. This new version features rewritten and expanded dialogue, new quests, new areas to explore, and the addition of several henchmen, as well as a new world map and completely overhauled graphics.

name: We Live Inside A Dream
description:
We are like the dreamer who dreams, and then lives inside the dream...but who is the dreamer?

We Live Inside a Dream is a first person interactive experience combining elements of the FPS, horror, puzzle, driving and stealth genres. Experience the uncanny town of Snoqualmie: The Hotel, Double R Diner, The Sheriffs Department, The Convenience Store, The Red Room and much more.

Uncover the mystery of the missing Deputy and answer the question of...who is the dreamer?...but be cautious as the road may not even lead you there...

name: Genesis II
description: Genesis 2 is a shoot 'em up for the Gameboy! Fight your way through five exciting levels to defeat each boss and prepare yourself to face the ultimate challenge, your final battle against AI GENESIS!

name: Freezing Knights
description: A light co-op turn-based RPG. Take control of two knights and try to reach the end of the perilous snowy mountain paths​ by avoiding enemy attacks and powering-up your characters.

name: Of Moons and Mania
description: Of Moons and Mania is an interactive psychostic break, based on lived experience. It uses elements of its design to explain the struggles of psychosis, and tells a personal story about mental illness.

name: Sabaku no Kuni no bouken-ki: Aru to Chitei no Meikyuu
description: A simple and nostalgic side-scrolling action game with rough dots and 3 chords.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Best Places
description: Best Places for you to visit by playing, Jigsaw Puzzle Best Places is a minimalist game with 5 difficulty levels (64, 144, 289, 484, and 784 pieces) with over 50 beautiful landscapes.

name: Tumble
description: Third-person Open World Adventure Exploration Game, About a Little Boy In Search of His Elder Brother

name: A Lonely Cabin Trip
description: You were supposed to have a relaxing cabin trip on a island all alone but after several strange encounters you had a mystery to solve, will you be able to survive a first-person psychological horror game or will you run away?

name: Cat + Dog
description: Control the cat and dog at the same time so they can collect their favourite snacks. The cat loves fish and the dog wants bones! The cat must not touch the bones and the dog must not touch the fish. A relaxing puzzle game with Sokoban elements.

name: Aeolus Fighter
description: "Aeolus Fighter" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the air.

name: Mister Furry
description: Entertaining Arcade Game, consisting of a Series of Exciting Mini-Games with the Beautiful Furry Boys. Amazing Atmosphere, Great Music, 58 Levels with Full HD Furry Artworks. Join us!

name: Cats and Sokoban: Mimi's Scratcher
description: Move boxes, jump on everything in sight, Mimi loves challenges like jumping long distances. Help her reach her scratcher!

name: Cursed Fables: Twisted Tower - Collector's Edition
description: When news of a creature stealing the souls of men from a local village reaches your coven, it’s the perfect chance for you to prove you’re ready to join their ranks! Do you have what it takes to stop the beast from destroying the kingdom, or will you lose yourself to the tower’s darkness?

name: Hentai Ojou
description: Hentai Ojou is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of young lady and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Disavowed
description: Disavowed is a Metroidvania that allows the player to freeze time and set up pinpoint shots to stun enemies. It is set in a world of plush and cute creatures where the player has been cast out and needs to go on a journey to gather more strength and get back at his creator for tossing him out.

name: First Sexy Night 2: Second Date
description: You just lost your virginity to Ginny and the whole world of sexual possibilities is wide open. Short and intimate visual novel about one relationship and their journey of sexual exploration.

name: Overstrike Arena
description: Welcome in the overstrike arena, a fast-paced competitive 2 versus 2 simulation where your only goal is to take control of the Overdrive and bring into your opponent's goal. Punch your adversaries, wall-ride, destroy and hack the various evolving arenas to get the advantage.

name: Lillian Night: Exclusive Contract of Succubus
description: Succubus-themed 3D animated visual novel with VR support

name: Glory to the Robots!
description: A game in the genre of management strategy. Here you can build your own factory for the production of robots, and on another planet, and extract resources and test robots on other different planets.

name: Sakura Mirror
description: Sakura adores her reflection in the mirror! She admires her beauty and tenderness in the mirror. She takes care of herself for hours in front of the mirror and she applies make-up.

name: Retro Tank Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Burger Chef Tycoon Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Boat Simulator
description: An adventure on the high seas like you've never seen before, with realistic graphics and sounds. Experience the sensation of sailing the entire ocean through the most mythical ships.

name: Mysterious Retro Games Bundle
description: Get an unhealthy dose of nostalgia with two titles which will revoke memories of early console games!

name: Rush Legends
description: Rush Legends is an online multiplayer First Person Shooter game with parkour mechanics where players can select a hero and utilize their unique abilities to be the last one standing.

name: I Frog-ot
description: A short horror- I mean, cute game :) Help a normal, innocent frog get back to his super awesome wizard self!! :O

name: Elves Jigsaw Puzzle Collection
description: Solve puzzles with the cutest pictures by relocating, rotating, or swapping different tiles.

name: Independence Day Run
description: Independence Day Run is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels as you complete your patriotic run.

name: Isolated Room
description: What to do when your days are not going well? What to do when you need to wake up and manage a troubled life, in which you need to work, eat well, and still have time for yourself? Isolated Room is about that, and maybe a little more.

name: Haram
description: A short narrative walking simulator inspired by the photography of Andres Serrano.

name: League of Enthusiastic Losers + Brawl Chess
description: Just because others call you a loser, doesn't mean you are one. Make the journey to the 90s Moscow and experience an adventure about friendship. This bundle includes Brawl Chess.

name: Mysterious Crimes Bundle
description: Crime Secrets: Crimson Lily -Stop the mysterious killer!

name: Broken Universe + Clumsy Rush
description: Roco is just an everyday racoon. He's just given his sweetheart a pretty necklace... which caused the entire universe to explode! She's nowhere to be found and he's the only one who can save her. Clumsy Rush is a guaranteed dose of a laugh for friends and family.

name: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Experience Calradia as never before with the Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord Deluxe Edition. The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

• Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord (full game)
• Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord Digital Companion, containing:
• An interactive map of Calradia
• Travels in Calradia audio story book
• Soundtracks from the game
• Concept Art

name: Super Mario Bros.: Wart's Wonderland
description: Super Mario Bros.: Wart’s Wonderland is a romhack of Super Mario Bros. 2 USA for NES. Created by Rohbert, it is meant to be a Holiday Season themed hack for experienced SMB2 players. It is more difficult than vanilla SMB2 but not as hard as other SMB2 hacks. Princess and Luigi will have an easier time completing the levels, where as Toad and Mario will struggle a bit more

name: The Jumping Cookie
description: Join Big C on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Legend of Feather
description: Lovely monsters hide sharp fangs! Survive in the tide of monster attacks! This is a time survival game with Roguelite and bullet screen elements. In each battle, you try to collect as much copper money as possible, improve your strength, and find the lost Jinwu Jiuyu to save the world.

name: Put Your Stamp On
description: Welcome back Mr. Director! Many things remained undone in your absence. It needs to be solved immediately.

name: Bio Prototype
description: A wave of irrational experimentation rushes towards you. Hurry up and mutate! evolution! Become scarier monsters than them! Use flesh and blood to bloom a way of survival!

name: Sakura Hime 3
description: You have just graduated school and have landed your first job as a butler for the luxury apartments "Sakura Gardens." Your main goal is to become an excellent butler who gives the girls all the pleasure and happiness they need!

name: Dolly Wars: Auto Tactics
description: Lead your Dolly army of squishy gummies to victory! Familiarize yourself with the strengths of each Dolly character and deploy them accordingly. Sit back and watch as your loyal Dollies move about and fight on their own. Win the war and turn the gummy world blue!

name: A Meeting of Dreams
description: A story rich RPG, where your decisions matter and can lead to disaster or salvation. Explore across two worlds, solving puzzles and finding secrets. Fight in tactical turn based combat, with no random encounters.

name: The Fantastic Kitty Rue
description: On the retro-futuristic planet of Felmuria lives a little girl named Felicity Rue. Despite living in destitution, she dreams of becoming the most famous tap dancer in the galaxy! The Fantastic Kitty Rue is a blend of visual novel, point-and-click, and rhythm game!

name: Japanese Goblins
description: Charming fairy-tale heroes. Puzzle game.

name: The Pentest
description: The Pentest is a first-person puzzle game. You play as a pentestor in charge of the security audit of the space station Achero 410. You will have to use your gear and skills to detect all the flaws and complete your mission.

name: Elves Christmas Hentai Puzzle
description: A relaxing puzzle game full of beautiful art featuring Christmas-themed sexy elves!

name: Insomnia: Theater in the Head
description: As the name suggests, it is a game depicting the feeling of insomnia, whose plot is revealed through the exquisite hand-drawn paintings of KeKe, the chief artist of "A Perfect Day".

name: Exome
description: EXOME is a co-op survival shooter with a focus on exploration, weapon progression and horde AI. Discover what grim mysteries are hidden in this deep forest. Explore and fight for survival, alone or with your friends.

name: Incomer
description: First-person action game against hordes of alien intruders.

name: Out of Bounds
description: Out of Bounds is a puzzle shooter where you need to "create" a game while "fixing" bugs!

name: The Block
description: The Block is the world's smallest city builder. Place randomly generated buildings on a square and watch your tiny city block come to life!

name: Arcane Vale
description: Arcane Vale is an action packed open-world RPG. Embark on an adventure to discover a long-lost treasure in a vast and dangerous world.

name: Panda Punch
description: Panda Punch is a puzzle platformer game in which you have to control a red panda and save the world from evil alien robots.

name: Black Sheep
description: Black Sheep is a 2D horizontal scrolling puzzle game, you will play a sophomore student in the flooded school ruins to explore the adventure, trace the shadow of the past, so that those buried in the bottom of the river of evil to see the light of day.

name: Military Conflict: Vietnam
description: A class-based infantry multiplayer first-person shooter set in the Vietnam War. Side with the Viet Cong or the U.S. Army in an intensive face to face combat in urban, suburban and rural settings of Vietnam. The game features an objective based gameplay and rewards teamwork.

name: Napoleon Maiden
description: "Napoleon Maiden" Live2D Visual Novel. Shoichi Sakikawa was a normal, second-year high school student.Or, he was, until he woke up from a car accident only to find himself trapped in mid-revolution 19th century France.

name: Harezora Monogatari Again!
description: "HarezoraMonogatari Again!" is an MMORPG where players can enjoy adventure and combat in a fantasy world. Choose from a variety of races and classes to create your character, team up with allies to challenge powerful enemies, and explore a vast world. Regular updates add new content, and the game offers both PvE and PvP gameplay.

name: My Pleasure: Season 1
description: My Pleasure is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel, full of hot women, mystery, and sex! This VN is packed with high-quality graphics, a rich story, humor, and hot close-up animations!

name: Cosmic Fantasy Collection
description: Cosmic Fantasy Collection is a video game compilation of the first two games of the Cosmic Fantasy series. Edia plans to release the compilation in English for the western market in the near future.

name: The Capcom Collection
description:
The Evercade EXP features 18 built-in games from world famous publisher Capcom!
Out of the box, no download required, you’ll have access to 14 arcade greats and 4 home console classics including
Street Fighter II’: Hyper Fighting, Mega Man, Final Fight, Ghouls ‘n Ghosts, Strider, Breath of Fire (full games list below) and more including full TATE mode support!

name: Mummification
description: Mummification - Fight ravenous mummies and cooperate with your AI teammates to survive !

name: Sex & Drift
description: Sex & Drift is a casual racing game. It`s a game where you can enjoy fast driving leaving far behind your opponents.

name: Furry Tale
description: Furry Tale is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely FURRY Girls. The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Placid Plastic Duck Simulator: Quacking the Ice
description: A new winter location for the ultimate high-tech rubber duck simulation! Enjoy Placid Plastic Duck on the mountains, relax by the fireplace, and quack the ice!

name: Tanks Battle
description: Defeat the enemy tank with the help of logic and tactics.

name: Vampiric Tower Remix
description: A puzzle game where you can fly around as a bat and try not to get zapped by pumpkins.

name: Furry Dream
description: Furry Dream is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Furry Girls. The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Emergency Crew 2: Global Warming
description: Hurricanes are raging in Sunland! Once again, Stephen Shepard leads an Emergency Crew to help people in their hour of need and get to the bottom of what's going on.

name: Furry Femmes: Making an Obedient Bitch
description: Mike would do anything for Kara, his childhood crush, and her dream of splicing animal DNA into humans. Out of desperation, they accept the help of the mysterious Kevin. When Kara's transformation also starts affecting her mind and making her submissive, Kevin sees his chance to take control...

name: WyndBlast
description: Wyndblast is a blockchain-based game built on the Avalanche network. Players can collect and battle unique NFT digital fighters, including assaulter, ranger, and vanguard classes, each with their own factions and rarity levels. The game features real-time battles and fast-paced gameplay, with the outcome determined by the statistics and abilities of the fighters that players bring to the battle.

name: One Shot Challenge
description: One Shot Challenge is a casual game that tests your accuracy. Your mission is to kill all the zombies that stand in your way, but there It's just a small problem, you have just a few bullets to shoot them all.

name: Eggcelerate! to the North Pole
description: Race through winter with slippery physics attempting to carry an egg on top of your vehicle! Time-trial your way to the top of the leaderboards, collect 100 snowmen and snowwomen hidden around the world, and do your best not to break an egg!

name: Tetsudou Nippon! Real Pro Tokkyu Soko! Nagoya Tetsudou-hen
description:
A train simulation game from Sonic Powered's "Japanese Rail Sim" series.

In this entry, you can drive through over 70km from Meitetsu Gifu Station to Jingumae Station on the Meitetsu Nagoya Main Line, from Jingumae Station to Tokoname Station on the Meitetsu Tokoname Line, and from Tokoname Station to Chubu International Airport Station on the Meitetsu Airport Line.
There are three types of trains you can drive, each with their respective section: The Meitetsu Series 3500 train run between Meitetsu Gifu Station and Jingumae Station; the Meitetsu Series 2200 train run between Jingumae Station and Chubu International Airport Station; and the Meitetsu Series 2000 train run through all sections.

This game is compatible with Zuiki's Densha de GO!! dedicated one-handle train controller for the Nintendo Switch.

name: Sperma
description: Experience a roguelite in a fashion you never asked for. Command a fleet of brave spermoids, upgrade your load, and save the world by getting fertilized!

name: Rattenkönig
description: A 2D horror puzzle platformer about a rat... and a dead rat.

name: LogiKing
description: LogiKing is a game where you utilize the effects of 10 cards numbered 0 to 9 and deduce your opponent's hidden cards.

name: Cosmo Dreamer
description:
A new dreamy shoot 'em up game!
Play through the game's unique combination of cute, colorful, whimsical visuals and bullet hell action.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Norway Reserve
description:
Pack your angling gear, tread the paths of trolls, and tell your own tale in the vast and tranquil Norwegian countryside - steeped in local folklore.

Trollsporet Nature Reserve awaits!

name: Woodland
description: Tiny island adventure game for the Playdate

name: MineSweeper Tetris
description: MineSweeper tetris a brand new casual 2D puzzle game that combines elements of minesweeper and tetris, find and mark the mines in a row to remove it. But be careful lines keep getting added over time.

name: Endless Ruin Chapter II: Hall of Spores
description: An interactive music video.

name: Construction Simulator: Kramer Pack
description:
The Kramer Pack expands your selection with three brand-new machines, giving you even more variety to tackle your construction contracts!

The Kramer 5507 is the very first Telescopic Loader in Construction Simulator ever, allowing you to move and organize cargo pallets more flexibly.

The Kramer 5035 is a Compact Wheel Loader made for small and narrow areas, while the Kramer 8155 is tailored for larger construction sites.

name: Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles - Definitive Collection
description: Includes Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles next-gen and prior-gen versions.

name: Rocketio 3
description: Rocketio 3 is a sequel to 2D shooter in a distant space. Find strength to fend off waves of enemy ships and defeat Boss. Good luck on your journey!

name: Let Chat Guess
description: Let Chat Guess is a Twitch.tv interactive game where viewers must guess how far the catapulted character will travel! Put your Twitch chat or friends to the test and let them try to guess the correct distance! Solo player? No worries! Try to climb the rankings and get on top of the leaderboards!

name: The Feast
description:
The Feast is a short and intensely dramatic experience designed to be completed in one sitting (20-30 minutes).

This dark and peculiar spectacle grants you the lead role. In a theatrical setting, survive the utterly confusing and twisted dinner. You will be observed and judged, so face reality, weigh every action, consider possible outcomes, make choices - and define the conclusion of this life-changing celebration.

After all, what happens here is not your problem…
… or is it?

name: Vampire Survivors: Legacy of the Moonspell
description: Legacy of the Moonspell is the first DLC for Vampire Survivors, and introduces a brand new stage, new characters, new monsters, and new weapons to slaughter them with. There might even be some hidden mysteries for those of an inquiring mindset, but we can neither confirm nor deny the presence of vampire.

name: Absolution's Apple
description: A thousand years beyond the fall of Earth, a team of adventurers seeks ancient treasure and the cure to a deadly disease, in this 600 page tale of love, crime, hope and despair, in a post-apocalyptic world like no other...

name: Tales from the Burning Sea
description: In cities sculpted from the slag of dead worlds, love, crime and fields of farmed meat await in this digital anthology of mystery and horror; a window onto a post-apocalyptic world like no other, one thousand years beyond the fall of Earth...

name: Jewel Match: Winter Wonderland 2 - Collector's Edition
description: ’Tis the season for chestnuts, mistletoe, and Match-3. Travel snow-clad lands across more than 200 huge levels and rebuild a cozy village. Then start decorating the houses for the festive season. Grab a hot chocolate while you play bonus games with jigsaw puzzles, clutter, or spot the difference.

name: Tropico 6: New Frontiers
description: "It's one small step for a Tropican, but one giant leap for Tropicankind!" With Tropico 6 - New Frontiers you'll set sail on one of the riskiest, most dangerous, and greatest adventures mankind has ever embarked upon. Help Tropico win the Space Race and make sure its El Presidente who claims glory for himself and Tropico by taking the famous first steps on the Moon!

name: Fap Goddess
description: Start your isekai journey in the land of goddesses, abyssal creatures and match-3 block madness - with a side of very, very naughty action! Create your dream harem while discovering the story behind each goddess, all while enjoying fun mechanics and engaging events!

name: Rambell
description: Rambell is an online and local multiplayer party game for 2-8 players. Beat up your friends in a variety of absurd games and destroy friendships in the unique collection of mini-games.

name: Aoi
description: This is a 2d platform adventure exploration game that combines platform jumping and straightforward fighting. Players will gradually find the lost memory and uncover the truth of this fantastic world with AOI.

name: Xmas Apocalypse
description: It's Christmas Eve during the Zombie Apocalypse and Santa has to gun down hordes of the undead or Christmas is ruined! Level up your firearms with upgrades from the Christmas skill tree and find the most destructive combinations. A festive time-survival third-person shooter with roguelite elements.

name: Rage Night
description: Earth has been chosen to host this season of RAGE NIGHT! Earth's greatest fighters past and future battle it out for the opportunity to be Rage Night Champion! Experience real-time PVP Cinematic Fighting, Simplified-Controls, Free-to-Play. Get ready to Rage!

name: Motherboard Under Attack
description: Solder diodes, capacitors and other electronic components to defend your motherboard from waves of evil viruses!

name: Ooglians
description: Ooglians are coming! Nothing excites an ooglian more than smashing machinery. Protect your machinery with more machinery which attracts even more ooglians. How unfortunate.

name: Longeyed Proj.
description: Prepare to be assigned to help investigate and identify anomalous creatures called the Longeyed.

name: World of Naples
description: Play single player or local co-op. Challenge your friends to local PVP. Simple mechanics. 20 levels, 4 bosses, 6 PVP arenas.

name: Grime: Colors of Rot
description:
Grim: Colors of Rot will come with:

- A new, massive area.
- New Bosses.
- New Abilities.
- New Traits.
- New Enemies.
- New Weapons.
- New Music.
- New NPC interactions.
- A New Cinematic.
- Hidden backtracking challenges, as a reward for re-visiting previously explored areas.
- Refreshable Healing that can be collected by hunting down runners.
- The ability to refight endgame variations of bosses after defeating the final boss.
- New Achievements.

name: PowerBots Builders
description: Build your base, survive asteroid fields, defeat challenging bosses, and save the universe! Grab a few friends for even more fun - bring up to four players in a classic split-screen style.

name: Instinct War
description: Enter in a bitesized roguelike dungeon crawller. Choose your hero and face relentless enemies through an everchaging card-based dungeon. Collect items to power up your hero to face the Instinct War.

name: Choice of the Viking
description: Sail forth to a land of gods and giants! Wield your sword, words, and magic to take your place among Iceland’s chieftains and forge your legacy of honor.

name: SokoFrog
description: SokoFrog is a puzzle game about pushing boxes, help your frog friend get to the next level.

name: EvoMon
description: Evomon Is a creature collector in tamagotchi version. Take care of your evomon since its infancy and discover its new evolutions, have fun playing the mini-games, adventure in mysterious expeditions, battle intensely against different monsters to reach the title of Evomon Champion.

name: Toaplan Arcade 1
description: The Toaplan Arcade 1 cartridge for Evercade features 8 classic arcade games from Toaplan, charting the history of this legendary developer through the '80s and '90s. Enjoy the top-tier shoot 'em up action of Tiger-Heli, Alcon, Flying Shark, Truxton and Zero Wing, then give your trigger finger a rest with action game Guardian, platformer Snow Bros. and puzzler Teki Paki!

name: Irem Arcade 1
description: The Irem Arcade 1 cartridge for Evercade features 6 great arcade games from Irem, including early hits Moon Patrol and 10-Yard Fight, the legendary R-Type, the quirky Battle Chopper, the visually stunning In the Hunt and the first ever official home release of Lightning Swords.

name: Aery: Path of Corruption
description: You play as a bird-like spirit and fly through the different scenarios of the decision-making process of the protagonist. Each level represents a different path that the protagonist could take. Discover the different paths, find their possible outcomes, and find a good future for your new friend.

name: Death Below
description: Death Below - is a third-person action adventure with elements of survival horror. The plot of the game is based on the legend of the Soviet experiment of the 1940s.You will plunge into a dark world, and begin an exciting investigation, fighting on your way with thousands of distraught people

name: Hidden Cats in London
description: Meow meow meow dear friends! Kitties are hidden in London, let's find them all. A short and pleasant experience! Start with a Beautiful monochromatic illustration, relax and find all the cats one by one to reveal the final colored art. Play through different modes and find special cats too!

name: Prime of Flames
description: This is a special strategy game that combines Wargame and Roguelike. As the guider of the former ancestors, you wake up and come. In the name of Star Envoy, you leave for the Human camp, and lead the warriors of different clans with talents and abilities to find the truth of history and disaster.

name: Last Meow Standing
description: This lightning fast arena shooter brings you right back to the highscore hunts of the arcade era. Use your arsenal of deadly weapons wisely against the increasingly ferocious monster hordes to survive as long as you can.

name: Portal Dungeon
description: In “Portal Dungeon”, in this multiplayer Roguelike adventure game with random elements, as an adventurer, you and your friends will bravely find the last portal in this portal world, defeat powerful enemies and save the world.

name: Neopets: Faerie Fragments
description: Delve into a captivating Neopian world full of intriguing characters, daring adventures, and compelling storylines! Build your own Faerieland in a casual, stress-free setting as you venture on an enchanting Neopian journey to help the lost Light Faerie find their way!

name: A Wholesome Game About Farming
description: This game is about farming! Just gold ol' planting crops in the daytime, and harvesting them in the daytime with no sinister nighttime gameplay or anything nefarious like that at all.

name: Splatter
description: Splatter is a first-person fever dream where you blast constantly-adapting enemies into neon sprays of pulp and slime. Enter a digital mindscape constructed by four anonymous administrators. Can you survive? Can you remain sane? Can you remain yourself?

name: Cassiodora
description: Cassiodora is a medieval fantasy game inspired by classic shoot 'em up with unique mechanics and epic boss fights. Save the princess Cassiodora by yourself or with up to 2 friends on the same screen.

name: LIP! Lewd Idol Project Vol. 2
description: A new girl is in town, Yuki appears! Join Kairi and Ranko as they do everything they can to make this mysterious gamer girl join the group. A new romance is born? A love triangle maybe? More yuri action than ever before? YES! These girls got you covered.

name: Last Shape Standing
description: Last Shape Standing is at its core a survival game where each player needs to survive through a multitude of chaotic and fun randomly selected challenges, be it bullet hell, PVP, a zombie apocalypse or even dangerous quizzes!

name: Melatonin
description: Melatonin is a rhythm game about dreams and reality merging together. It uses animations and sound cues to keep you on beat without any intimidating overlays or interfaces. Harmonize through a variety of dreamy levels containing surprising challenges, hand-drawn art, and vibrant music.

name: The Crackpet Show
description: The Crackpet Show is an action-packed rogue-lite shoot-'em-up about mutated animals that fight in a bizarre TV show, crushing their opponents with a variety of weapons. Choose your beastie, gear 'em up, and go kill your enemies in the name of fame and sweet sponsorship deals!

name: River City Girls 2
description: Picking up shortly after the original, River City Girls 2 once again put you in control of Misako and Kyoko - as well as Kunio, Riki, and a few new characters - as they set out on an all-new beat-'em-up adventure across the mean streets of River City. New moves, new enemies, new recruits, new environments, and the return of an old foe await, along with the same over-the-top sense of humor and adrenaline-pumping combat of its predecessor. The game will also feature two-player co-op action both locally and online.

name: Blacktail
description: Become the witch of the woods in Blacktail. Slavic myth comes to life in this first-person open world action adventure. Discover Yaga’s story and guide her along the path to become a fearsome guardian of the forest or the dark legend that haunts children’s nightmares.

name: Bots Are Stupid
description: An ultra-precise 2D Platformer where you give Robots instructions instead of directly controlling them.

name: Gorilla Tag
description:
Reject humanity.

Run, climb, and jump in VR using a unique locomotion method that only needs the movement of your hands and arms. No buttons, no sticks, no teleportation. Push off of surfaces to jump and squeeze them with both hands to climb. The game mode is simple tag, for up to 3 players, or infection mode, with 4 or more. Run from the infected gorillas, or outmaneuver the survivors to catch them. Parkour up trees and cliff faces to evade and chase people down. Hang out in a virtual, low-fi jungle with randos or group up in a private room with friends to hang out and play. The stakes are low, so feel free to just chat or make up your own games. The movement is easy to learn, and hard to master. Crossplay with the Quest version of the game, so play with anyone, anywhere.

Become gorilla.

name: Akai Katana Shin
description: Be guided anew into an epic tale set in the Taisho era with three titles from Cave's Akai Katana series that has captured the hearts of passionate shoot 'em up fans. The Shin version is enriched with new modes, online leaderboard, new musical arrangements and improved audio-visual rendering by converting the title from slot machines.

name: Blank Page
description: Immerse yourself in a mysterious story where your choices influence the hero's story and decide the ultimate fate of the characters. A story where love and carnal passion intertwine. Love, sex, and mystery.

name: Gitadora Fuzz-Up
description: The ninth game in the Gitadora series, a spinoff series of the GituarFreaks and DrumMania franchises.

name: Travle
description: Travle is a daily country guessing game, where players must create a route from one given country to another which passes through the fewest amount of countries possible.

name: Santa's Letters VR
description: Santa's Letters is a spatial puzzle game in which you have to find matching pieces among a lot of other interesting things. Put them together to make a toy!

name: Kurmatron
description: Take control of the Kurmatron, a symbiotic creature like a turtle shell. Abduct animals and gain different powers to take on an evil corporation. A retro, eco-friendly game for the whole family.

name: Cannelé & Nomnom: Defective Agency
description: Cannelé & Nomnom: Defective Agency is a fantasy comedy interactive fiction game. Players follow an amnesic individual who hires a duo of disastrous detectives in order to investigate three mysteries.

name: Nightmare Knock
description: Nightmare knock is a visual novel about a simple man who gets knocked on his window at night. What happens next is up to you, because there are many choices in the game that affect the story and whether you survive the night. 8 possible endings, only one of which you will survive. Nice atmospheric graphics, your own soundtrack, and high-quality sounds will plunge the user into an atmosphere of despair and fear.

name: ZigZagging Ski
description: Do you remember the last time you were on vacation?

name: Beauty from Wisdom
description: After some brainstorming, although you are a little tired, enjoying the beautiful scenery may relax you.

name: Animal Survivors
description: Animal Survivors is a casual game with elements of a simplified roguelike. A time-based survival game with minimalistic gameplay and elements of a simplified roguelike.

name: Baker Business 3
description: Manage your very own bakery. Discover recipes, bake tasty treats and sell them to your customers. Unlock upgrades such as ovens and display shelves to expand your bakery. Customize the interior and exterior style to create your dream bakery.

name: Scary Pictures: Yavez - Seven Deadly Sins
description: Scary Pictures: Yavez - Seven Deadly Sins in the novel-horror genre. The game will plunge you into the atmosphere of the classic and gloomy history of the Soviet times. You have to face many life choices that will have consequences and lead to one of eight endings.

name: The Curse of Eclipse
description: This is an adventure and puzzle game inspired by old school games of 1980s like Atic Atac from ZX Spectrum. You walk in a cursed house avoiding enemies and finding keys and magical scrolls. The game is playable with 3rd person, 1st person and top down views. Created by a solo developer.

name: The Awakening Program
description: A man hibernates due to an incurable disease, only to awaken as soon as a cure is found, but to preserve his brain during awakening, he lives in a simulation

name: Sker Ritual: Goon Brenn
description: Haunt Sker Island with the infamous phantom black cat, Goon Brenn and become the beast of Sker Island, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Castle Crumble
description: Where physics allows you to have fun with a blast! Your goal is clear - castles must fall. Become a hero in far fantasylands. With powerful explosives and mystical spells, crash forts from Ancient, Medieval, Aztec and other times. Aim to win!

name: Arcade Archives: Marvel Land
description: Sin descripción

name: NBA Clash
description: Introducing NBA Clash, the fast-paced head-to-head game that will have you hooked on basketball like never before! School your opponents with quick drives to the basket, long-range 3-pointers, and explosive dunks. As you climb the leaderboards, unlock new NBA Stars to add to your ideal team. Set your lineup and execute the best strategy to dominate the competition and become the ultimate NBA Clash champion!

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Free Next-Gen Update
description:
Next-gen update is free for all current owners of The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt on Xbox One.
Includes Performance and Quality modes, the latter implements Ray Tracing features.
Community-made mods and CD Projekt Red gameplay/content additions are baked into the game.
Features free Netflix “The Witcher” series-inspired DLC, including a new quest.
Cross progression lets you bring saves from and to other platforms.

name: Ninja Warrior Princess
description:
During a school trip to a ninja village attraction, you and your classmates participate in a gravity-defying training course that’s impossibly hard for everyone… except you. After clearing it with ease, you’re whisked away and told that you’ve been chosen to bring peace to two warring ninja clans—the attraction was merely a front.

You brush it off, but then you’re suddenly attacked by three ninja princesses claiming to be from a rival clan! When they show up again as new students at your school, will you be able to fend them off?!

name: Cherry Tale
description: Cherry Tale is an erotic visual novel.

name: Boinkgame
description:
Boinkgame is a precision platformer where the only enemy is yourself.

And the walls... The walls are a bigger enemy actually.

name: TermoVerse Chronicles
description: A fan-made game dedicated to I Termosifoni.

name: Toilet Chronicles: Staff Only
description: Extended version of the "Toilet Chronicles"

name: Collab Ball
description: Collab Ball is an amazingly beautiful splitscreen platformer!

name: Planet Breakout 2
description: A free space-themed breakout game with unique powerups, level editor, and easy modding support.

name: Unrush
description: Help Chhama find his grandson.

name: BallisticNG: Maceno Island
description:
Welcome to Maceno Island, a man made paradise home to high rise sea fronts, massive jungles, precarious mountain thrills and an AGL newcomer with a rich history in sea bed mineral mining and designer sandals.

Maceno Island introduces 6 new tracks, all playable in forward and reverse, a new campaign and a new set of colorful liveries.

name: Garden Galaxy
description: Discover, collect and organise to create your own unique garden in this relaxing idle / creative sandbox!

name: Sleep Paralysis: The Uncanny Valley
description: A story-rich first-person psychological horror game. You are in a lonely house, suffering from sleep paralysis. Deal with Thomas’ past trauma and make meaningful decisions that prevent you from going insane.

name: Hapland Trilogy
description: Light the torches, open the portal and become Grand Saviour of Hapland.

name: Aka
description: Find inner peace in a small, open-world game. On these carefully handcrafted islands, you can take a nap on a giant monster, feed baby dragons, take care of the fauna and flora... ...but demons from your past might come back to remind you what you want to forget.

name: Aquarium Travels
description: Recover aquariums from the evils of darkness! Aquarium Travels is an entertaining video game full of eye-popping visuals, just a click away! Recover the beautiful themed aquariums by repopulating them with fish, defending them from the threats that exist.

name: Master of Magic
description: Take up the role of a great wizard, wield powerful spells, command fantasy races and challenge your rivals in this remake of a cult turn-based strategy classic. Do you have what it takes to become Master of Magic?

name: Lil Gator Game
description:
The world is big when you’re a lil gator... Good thing it’s also full of friends!
