There’s a buddy atop every hill in this open-world, movement-focused adventure and they all seem to need help! Bop cardboard baddies, brave serene hills and forests, and scale sheer rocks that only a kid would dare!

name: Snowtopia: Ski Resort Builder
description: "Snowtopia is a ski resort construction game with a hint of strategy and respect for the environment. It is intended for ski enthusiasts and tycoon players."

name: Yōkaimaki
description: The blood moon has risen once again, meaning the yōkai (cryptids) have emerged from the murky depths of the sea. As the heir to the family restaurant, use your fishing and cooking skills to serve up some delicious yōkai sushi!

name: You Are Mine 2
description:
Part 2 of the popular love story has finally arrived!

In this interactive romance otome game, you are the one in control of the romantic story!

You have several options as to how the story will unfold.
Immerse yourself in an enchanted game of your choice.

name: Fhtagn Nagh
description: Large tower temple map "built entirely on the 64-unit grid. A brushwork experiment taken to strange extremes." Requires Copper v1.20+ (NOT included). Custom music by Pantheist

name: Planet Zoo: Grasslands Animal Pack
description: Discover spectacular new species of the grasslands with the Planet Zoo: Grasslands Animal Pack, featuring eight diverse animals who all reside in natural steppes, plains and prairies across the world!

name: Tasokare Hotel Re:newal
description:
Tasokare Hotel Re:newal is an adventure game on Steam, iOS, and Android. This is a remake of Tasokare Hotel. The goal of game is to escape the hotel.

The game is divided into three parts: novel, search, and interrogation. You read the story in the novel part. In the search part, you find the evidence you need to solve. The interrogation part you use evidence to get to the bottom of the case.

name: R&Dy
description:
Little Alchemy meets Factorio in this genre-bending relaxing collectathon sandbox!

(Made for the Big Festive Game Jam 2022)

name: Sayonara
description: Wave goodbye.

name: Grand Theft Auto Online: Los Santos Drug Wars
description: Grand Theft Auto Online: Los Santos Drug Wars is a content update for Grand Theft Auto Online. The game features a ragtag crew of new arrivals led by Dax, a man-on-the-edge with high hopes of dosing the world, getting rich, and climbing to the top of the Southern San Andreas criminal food chain.

name: Train Sim World 3: The Holiday Express - Runaway Elf
description: With Train Sim World 3: The Holiday Express - Runaway Elf, drive a model locomotive around a nostalgic 1980s living room and complete unique challenges before Christmas Morning arrives! Can you stop the mischievous Elf from ruining the big day?

name: Color Invader VR
description: Color Invader is a fun VR adventure shooting puzzle, where your job is to defend the galaxy from invasion. The game promises a lot of fun with over 350 unique levels that have multiple game modes, bonus stages, and level features.

name: Hunt: Showdown - Frau Perchta
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter with two variations, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Perchta: Dawn (Hunter), Perchta: Dusk (Hunter), Midwinter Tusk (Martini-Henry IC1), Unkempt (LeMat Mark II), and The Avalanche (Frag Bomb).

name: YoukaiMaki
description: The blood moon has risen once again, meaning the yōkai (cryptids) have emerged from the murky depths of the sea. As the heir to the family restaurant, use your fishing and cooking skills to serve up some delicious yōkai sushi!

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cities: Skylines - Financial Districts Bundle
description: Financial Districts is the expansion from Colossal Order that adds the “Investments” feature and more than 100 assets to Cities: Skylines. Explore this Expansion together with “Map Pack 2” and “African Vibes” Radio Station in the “Financial Districts Bundle”.

name: Zombie Sokoban for Playdate
description: A push crate puzzle game but with a zombie!

name: Four Corners for Playdate
description: Rectangles. Bombs. Bonuses. Are you a Corner Master?

name: Warp Nexus
description: With a deep, dynamic, player-controlled economy built on Unreal Engine 5, Warp Nexus is a community-driven spaceship MMO and trading game accessible through the STARL Metaverse. Start with 16 sectors and species, customize your ships and characters, battle, trade, make alliances or choose piracy to conquer galaxies. Trade or battle for assets that can be either gameside or blockchain side depending on the user's preference. With zero pay to win advantages, this game is all about a player's skill and knowledge gained through the game economy and battling.

name: Blob Beats
description: Classical music, arcade style.

name: Uno 2 Go
description: All aboard the newest way to play UNO! The card game everyone loves is going on a cruise and this is your lucky invitation! UNO 2 is the easiest way to play UNO anywhere and at any time.

name: PGA Tour 2K23 x NBA 2K23 Bundle
description: Rise to the occasion and realize your full potential in NBA 2K23. Prove yourself against the best players in the world and showcase your talent in MyCareer or The W. Then take your skills on the PGA Tour and become the next FedExCup Champion as you compete against tour pros and establish new rivalries.

name: Tilting Tiles: Ultimate Tilt Remix
description: Ultimate Remix is a movement based puzzle game. Each level is a carefully crafted challenge and your goal is to find the most efficient route through the level. Examine each level carefully to solve your way across the terrain using special moves and the environment to your advantage to stay within the move limit.

name: Crazy City Driving
description: Crazy City Driving is a car driving game around the city. Get behind the wheel of one of the cars and get to the finish line, but remember your time is limited!

name: 13 Candles
description: 13 Candles is an atmospheric horror game where you play as Sara, 13 year old girl who wakes up in an abandoned hospital. Find your way to the light switch and wake up from your nightmare.

name: Wufo
description: Navigate your ship and recover Wi-Fi while dodging obstacles and fighting space enemies in the 4 worlds and 8 available bosses. You can also play together with a friend in 2D cooperative multiplayer!

name: Race Journey
description: Join this Race Journey thorough the racing in the car. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Megami Tensei Gaiden - Shinyaku Last Bible III: Mugen no Eiyuu
description:
The "Megami Tensei Gaiden: Last Bible" series incorporates the deep worldview of the "Megami Tensei" series with a touch of fantasy and is positioned as an outside story that is different from the previous series. This is a completely original work that could only be distributed and played on feature phones.

This work is set on the planet Damir. It was a peaceful planet with abundant water and greenery, but five years ago, demonic beasts began to appear.
People were exhausted by the repeated attacks of the monsters and beasts, and everyone kept looking for a brave man who would save the world. ......
One day, the hero accidentally wears a mysterious bracelet called "COMP" which attracts magical beasts. The protagonist sets out on a journey to discover the true identity of "COMP". And to face his own destiny, he sets off on a journey into the vast world.

In addition to the series' customary "Nakama System" in which players negotiate with demonic beasts that stand in their way as enemies and, if successful, are lent power, this title also features the "Obedience Attack," in which defeated demonic beasts recognize your power and become your befrienders, enabling you to collect befrienders more efficiently. Together with your unique friends and fellow travelers, you will unravel the truth of the history passed down to you on the planet Damir.

name: Cities: Skylines - African Vibes
description: Influenced by traditional African music, this Radio Station will inspire every city planner with 16 tracks and more than one hour of music.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Map Pack 2
description: Get some new inspiration and build more diverse Cities with “Map Pack 2” from the community modder Sidai. This Content Creator Pack adds 10 maps that represent different biomes such as Boreal, Desert, Tropical, and Temperate.

name: Tower! Simulator 3
description: Introducing the latest generation of ATC simulator, that provides a level of immersion like no other. With advanced voice recognition, custom modelled and detailed airports and state-of-the-art lighting, geometry and textures. Tower! Sim 3 is the gold standard for air traffic control simulation.

name: Keystone Library
description: Keystone Library is a game for people who enjoy typing commands and enjoy a relaxing open-ended story adventure. Type words successfully to earn points, upgrade your character at the shop, dive into side quests, and take on the many boss levels available to you.

name: Cities: Skylines - Financial Districts
description: Boost the economy of your City with a financial district, and use your funds to invest in the best industries for your population. Financial Districts adds the new feature “Investments” and more than a hundred assets to the game.

name: Lie of Caelum
description: Giant robots. Technology abusing magic. Conflict between countries. Join a group of fated individuals and liberate the planet of Caelum from the shackles of its people. Discover the mysteries behind their powers, and dwell in their lives in this Sci-fi JRPG.

name: P.E.P
description: P.E.P Is an online 8 Player PvEvP game set in a zombie filled coastal United States City.

name: Fastraq
description: Fastraq is a high-speed anti-gravity racing game. Drive on roller coaster like tracks, overtake your opponents and engage in combat. Experience tight turns, 360 degree loops and intense combat.

name: Crisis Core: Final Fantasy VII: Reunion - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: In addition to the game, you will also receive a mini soundtrack showcasing the game’s powerful music and an art book filled with gorgeous illustrations.

name: Crisis Core: Final Fantasy VII - Reunion
description: Crisis Core: Final Fantasy VII - Reunion is an HD remaster of the smash hit prequel to Final Fantasy VII. In addition to all graphics being remastered in HD, fully voiced dialogue and new soundtrack arrangements make for a dynamic new retelling of a beloved classic.

name: High on Life
description: From the mind of Justin Roiland (Rick and Morty, Solar Opposites) comes High On Life. Humanity is being threatened by an alien cartel who wants to use them as drugs. It’s up to you to rescue and partner with charismatic, talking guns, take down Garmantuous and his gang, and save the world!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector - Sisters of Battle
description: With its own distinct unique gameplay mechanics and flavour and plenty new units, the Adepta Sororitas are included as a fully fleshed out playable faction.

name: Dungeon: Faster & Deadlier
description: In this singleplayer card game, full of strategic options yet simple mechanics, your brain gets what it craves. Heroes fight under your command in a vast, dark world. They crush their enemies with your prudent judgement, spells, cult items and brute force. Or vice versa.

name: The Elevator Game with Catgirls
description: Kirin plays the elevator game and disappears. Will her girlfriend, Asahi, be able to find her? The Elevator Game with Catgirls is a horror visual novel with point-and-click elements, inspired by the Korean urban legend, Elevator to Another World.

name: Deltazone
description: Deltazone is a tactical shooter set in a war-torn world where mysterious purple crystals called Veilstone have sparked a global conflict. Players lead a military squad through corrupted landscapes and abandoned cities, fighting against rival factions while dealing with the crystal's radiation effects that have mutated local wildlife and transformed the environment. The game combines strategic resource management of Veilstone crystals with squad-based combat, as players attempt to reclaim their homeland while navigating between hostile human forces and mutated creatures. The narrative unfolds across a campaign where control of these energy-rich crystals determines the balance of power in a world where alliances shift and survival depends on tactical decisions.

name: Potion Craft
description: Potion Craft is an alchemist simulator where you physically interact with your tools and ingredients to brew potions. You're in full control of the whole shop: invent new recipes, attract customers and experiment to your heart's content. Just remember: the whole town is counting on you.

name: Baki-baki Memoir
description:
A collaboration game with a famous YouTuber!

Control the main character, Gunpi, and conquer the three heroines!

name: Eyes
description:
Escape the EYES lab, while They are watching.

I need to tell you something.Yesterday, when I was out walking, someone approached me.Looked me in the EYES and blinked at me.He closed his left eye, then left.Didn't even say a word.I have never met this man in my life.I don't understand what happened.And I don't know why it happened either.

name: SMW For Your Kids Only
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Little Miss A.D.D. World
description:
Super Little Miss A.D.D. World is designed to teach basic fundamentals of Super Mario World to a relatively inexperienced player. This hack is dedicated to my daughter who would play Vanilla with me, but could only play Yoshi's Island 1, Yoshi's Island 2, and Star Road 2. There's no chocolate. However there are memes, jokes, emotes, tributes, some light-hearted trolling, and even a puzzle. There's also guest levels coming from some incredibly talented individuals, including 2 from Little Miss A.D.D. herself!

The design is to be a teaching hack, while not appearing to be a teaching hack, and can be played as a beginner alone, played together with a friend, or even as an experienced player looking for some lighthearted fun. This hack has 5 main levels, each focusing on teaching differing skills with a goal of preparing a player for Vanilla SMW or most easy to normal hacks. "Home" teaches basic fundamentals such as moving, running, jumping, carrying items, switches, and simple problem solving. "The Underground" adds skills such as enemy behavior, simple platforming, Yoshi ditching, and boss fights. "The Sky" teaches all about simple cape mechanics and other methods of flying. "The Forest" teaches simple puzzles, types of level design, and autoscrollers. "The End" is an ultimate test of all the skills taught.

Each of the first 4 levels contain hidden exits to "The Fun Islands", which are fun levels designed to reinforce various skills taught.

If you can find it, there's also a 6 exit mini Kaizo: Intermediate hack hidden within. Each level is based off of a memory I have with various streamers that I consider friends, and this is dedicated to them.

75 exits, 47 moons/coins = 100%
83 exits, 47 moons/coins = 111%

name: Pokémon Emerald Crest
description: Vanilla Emerald's Story with lots of new features from the later gen and a few extra quests.

name: Regulate
description:
A universe...
It's filled up with garbage asteroids.
Planets have spaceships to destroy them.
But they are not using attack ships. Nobody knows why.
And they need some objects. These objects can be found in neighbor planets.
But they are not going for taking them too!
This universe needs an organizator. Wonder who can make things right here...
Maybe you can?

name: That Lonesome Valley
description: A short retro-style gay romance game / visual novel about walking, sheepherding, and kissing.

name: 2 Many Pixels
description: 2 Many Pixels is an endless & fast-paced 2D minimal shooter. Blast enemies & unlock upgrades to help you survive for as long as possible!

name: Sweet Solitaire: School Witch 3
description: Any miracles are possible here, the world of magic lives by its own laws. Many interesting levels to pass on the way! The difficulty varies and is ideal for fans of the genre, and unique gold cards will make the game even more interesting.

name: Evermore Knights
description:
Welcome, Knights of Evermore!

Evermore Knights is a turn-based JRPG that follows the story of a Commissioner tasked with uncovering the source of the mysterious force known as "Dread" plaguing the land of Temeris. As the player, you will take on the role of a Commissioner and build a team of four characters, each with their unique statistics, attributes, and skills. As you explore the world and battle fearsome monsters, your characters will gain experience and level up, becoming more robust and more powerful.

name: Generation Zero: Eastern European Weapons Pack
description: The Östertörn weapons collection is now expanded with new guns from eastern Europe! Use them to fight deadly machines and raise the resistance!

name: Pulpcraft DX
description: Pulpcraft DX is a 1D Minecraft clone for the Playdate Handheld

name: Undertone
description: A stylized first-person game that makes use of a lens gun to mix colors to effectively fight monsters.

name: Crossword World Puzzle
description: English crossword games with words puzzle! Improve vocabulary by word search!

name: Ok I Pull Up
description: Ok I Pull Up is a rage platformer, in which you, a capybara, ascend a tree tower only by jumping. This punishing, yet fair game requires extreme patience to complete.

name: Rootless: Memories of Green
description: Rootless: Memories of Green is a classic 2D adventure game set in a futuristic cyberpunk world.

name: Blood Wizard Odyssey
description: An absurd comedy turn-based RPG about wizards in a blood world.

name: Cario 3
description: Cario continues his dangerous ride. Help him get as far as possible and get the highest score possible. Good luck on your journey!

name: Where is a Toilet!?
description: 'Where is a Toilet!?' is a simple running-platformer game using only move and jump key. Player is reach to the Goal avoiding obstacles. Player also can get a combo bonus through stomping villains. Two or more combo bonus get player faster and invincible, it is a important key to the victory.

name: Rêves: Lettres et Ciel
description: A French rpg maker game about a postman in a world filled with magic. feature voice acting and art made by several French artists. It is a fantasy adventure game with a focus on the story and turn based battles.

name: Fate Seeker: Journey
description: Fate Seeker: Journey is an action role-playing game that combines random elements of Roguelite. In this game, you will be the hero to choose talents, obtain items and combine skills to defeat enemies in every stage.

name: Project: Playtime
description: Project: Playtime is a Free-to-Play multiplayer horror game where six players attempt to create one giant toy while surviving a terrifying monster that roams the toy factory. A seventh player controls the monster and is given only one goal: Find and kill everyone.

name: House of Ghosts
description: House of ghosts is a single-player horror survival game. Stop the demon and find out the name of his victim before he drags you to hell. Run and hide. Just don't get caught.

name: Fiend Heart
description: A short game about monster girls.

name: Chop Goblins
description: Pursue the malevolent Chop Goblins through time, and foil them with devastating weapons, in this bite-sized FPS from the creator of Dusk, Iron Lung, and Squirrel Stapler

name: What a Ball
description: What a Ball - A different kind of ball racing game. Follow Blue's adventure running against more than 600 Balls racing together. Be the Ball: Crash, jump, bounce and run up to 300 Km per hour. It's very challenging and hardcore game, if don't believe us, just try it.

name: Outworld Patrol
description: Control a space rover as you jump to avoid obstacles on a horizontally scrolling landscape while shooting down alien ships that shoot missiles from above or charge you head on. A love letter to the first game I ever played on PC.

name: Knights and Craftsmen
description:
Create your own story in Knights and Craftsmen. The lord can also obtain funds through the trade between the city-state, and gain prestige by completing the task. Through the ocean port, he can open up overseas colonies to obtain more territory and resources. Finally, a great and powerful city-state will be established.
You can also be the creator of a story.

name: Maptroid: Worlds
description: A metroidvania experienced entirely in the map! Explore and fill the map of several planets in this minimalistic and abstract metroidvania game, collect powerups to get to new places, and discover lore items to read. Have extra fun in the puzzletroid maps, or relax in zentroid.

name: Incarnage
description:
Incarnage is an arcade-style top-down shooter that increases your speed the more you kill.
You play as Nilus, one of the lead soldiers in the rebellion against Kro-Tech and it's tyrannous rule over Krome. Fight through their forces of soldiers, mechanisms, and horrifying experiments as you move through Krome's various locales and destroy the source of the madness.

name: LazuLight: By Your Side
description:
Like a star pulled from the skies, a bird torn of its wings, you were bound to the Earth that day. You once ruled the skies, feeling the air rush through your hair as you flew between the clouds, clothes fluttering in the wind as you raced higher and higher. However, that's all in the past now, ever since the accident.

Now, completely opposite to what you once felt, the world is monotonous, gray, and dead. You find no meaning in life, as if frozen in time, now that your freedom was taken away from you.

However, that would all come to change with three fated encounters. The appearance of an old acquaintance from the track team, a reserved class president that seems to be hiding something, and a kindred soul seeking solace in the silence.

Faced with these new people who suddenly appeared in your life, you have to make the choice. Do you wallow in your failure in this monochrome prison, or do you take their hand and repaint this world?

By their side, the hands of the clock start ticking once more.

name: Alchemy Garden
description: Alchemy Garden is a sandbox game that mixes gardening, alchemy and exploration mechanics. Feel free to explore this little world and find new recipes or components, brew potions and be creative designing your own garden!

name: Steptile
description:
An ancient boardgame filled with steps and tiles. 20 tiny levels to solve and many, many tiles to step!

Maybe some secret stages too?

name: Karasu Meltdown
description:
Karasu Meltdown puts you into the elephant's foot of hell raven Utsuho Reiuji, who thought it'd be a fun idea to smash up the Palace of Earth Spirits!

But Satori's having none of it and sending all of her pets to stop her!
Shoot, dodge, bomb, and raise bullet hell in this caravan shoot 'em up!
This game was originally made in three weeks for the Gunner Parade '22 Winter League game jam.

name: Castle Puzzlefort
description: Small medieval / castle themed puzzle level with no enemies for vanilla Quake. Inspired by the Amiga game Castle Master. Also supports deathmatch. Map source is included.

name: Duality: An Era of Stone
description:
Undertake your deity right, and create unlimited resources for your population by matching. Shape the world in which they live with unique customization, unlock technology, and avoid calamities. Gather Devotion and use your deity powers to blast through the Stone Age. Each level prompts you to make decisions, which influence how the population perceives you.

Solve match 3 puzzle games and steer your population through the Stone Age!

Are you ready to help your population survive and thrive through the Stone Age?

name: Super Metroid: Map Rando
description: First randomizer to randomly rearrange all the rooms into a geographically valid new map

name: Distributor Simulator
description: Distributor simulator is open world, third person game. Here you have to buy goods al lowest possible price and sell and deliver it to shops for higher price. Price is changing so buy and sell carefully, otherwise you will bankrupt.

name: Stick to the Plan
description: A relaxing and charming puzzle game about Roberto, a dog who really loves loooooooong sticks with a plan in mind.

name: Lights
description: Sin descripción

name: Phylactery Factory
description: As a servant of the Vile Lord, Calamax, you must power his most evil and wicked of machines!

name: Frog Wizard Gem Quest
description: Discover the powers of magic gems and use them to solve puzzles!

name: Tractor Journey: Nitro
description: Join this Tractor Journey thorough the racing in the pimped tractor with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Welcome to the World of Zippy the Circle: Visual Novel
description: Welcome to the World of Zippy the Circle: Visual Novel tells the story of Zippy and his adventures as part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: The Jumping Gingerbread: Turbo
description: Join Big G on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Àrengard: Invasion
description: Àrengard-Invasion is a beat-`em-up online-coop game. Swing your sword, shoot a ballista or cast spells to survive the Goblins siege and keep your beloved gold.

name: Run Away With Me, Empress!
description:
Enrolled in a super-exclusive school full of beauties, take advantage of your luck.

You've been scouted to attend the most prestigious, exclusive school of the nation, surrounded by girls at least as beautiful as you (and you're pretty good-looking). Years of hard work have finally paid off.

You and your peers are to be "shaped up to accompany the elite of society". You've been told you'll get assigned an Emperor's Title at one point, but most of your breathtakingly beautiful classmates already have one. In the meanwhile, maybe you can get closer to one of them...?

name: It Can Happen: Visitors
description: Sin descripción

name: School Days Simulator
description: The high school is full of cute and adorable students! Make many friends on your first day at school, beat the bad student and eventually you will be falling in love with someone there. Which one do you want to be inside your heart?

name: Emo Quest XD
description: A Quest about Soul, Love and Emotion, inspired by retro rpg style!

name: MILF Next Door
description: The new neighbor needs a tutor for her son... but that's not the only thing she's after!

name: A War On Christmas
description: After reports of a mass slaughtering of good little children by a crazed man in a Santa suit, you track them down to one final stand-off. This is A War On Christmas...

name: Kawatare
description: Kawatare is a 3D adventure game based on the Fukushima Daiichi disaster. Taking place a month after the incident, the game provides a post-disaster scenario in which through its exploration, the player will discover more about the protagonist, the city, and its inhabitants.

name: Roche Limit: The Death of CMK
description:
Roche Limit: The Death of CMK is a horror-surrealist style PowerPoint game made over the course of eight months. It features over 1,500 slides and 80+ unique hand drawn scenes.
The game is a follow-up to the developer's 2019 project The EdCo Incident.

2 additional endings where planned for and worked on as a possible update for the game but have been dropped in favor of a new game that continues the themes with a new story.
An OST for the cut ending scenes was released with interludes and titles, ending 2's title was The Golden Age and ending 3's title was Depi Lontan.

name: Pill Game
description: Pill Game is a platformer with many levels.

name: Doggerfall
description: Doggerfall - This is an adventure game about a cute dog named Dogger, he has to walk around the neighborhood of his home in order to eradicate a terrible threat that hangs over him.

name: Short Horror Story
description: An unexpected visitor turns a peaceful night in the desert into a terrifying nightmare. An horror FPS made in two weeks, Short Horror Story, is a non linear horror tale that develops in a creepy shooter game.

name: Sushi Clicker
description: A clicker game revolving around Sushi! Create sushi, Sell sushi and buy upgrades in an endless cycle to continue creating infinite sushi to become the ultimate sushi chef!

name: reSnake
description: Your classic snake with a timely twist!

name: Rayman Arena Definitive Edition
description: Rayman Arena Definitive Edition is simply Rayman Arena PC in its best form possible! Patched by the fans to fully work on Windows 7/10/11 and bundled with essential improvements: HD aI upscaled Textures, controller support, vibration fix, LAN patch, widescreen resolution support, custom player skins...

name: Wolf Girl With You: Full Moon Edition
description: Guess who's back? Back again. Liru is back! Tell a friend!! The DLC for that flirtalicious cohabitation simulation title "Wolf girl with you" is finally here! So what are you waiting for? Get ready to start a new life with Liru! Doggo!!

name: No Time For Caution
description: No Time For Caution is a 3d parkour game. Sit back and enjoy the parkours with different difficulty levels. Don't forget! No time for caution.

name: Wyoming Winter
description: "Wyoming Winter" is a multiplayer horror game where players must survive against a powerful, fast-moving creature called the Blight. Players can find weapons through completing a checklist to prevent the Blight from escaping the facility. The game is best played with 3-8 players, and servers are available in Europe, America, and Asia.

name: Bilmo
description: Bilmo is simple 3D arcade-like game, where you have to get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: Winfray
description: A very epic and goofy winter-themed snowball fight game. Combat other players in a fast-paced first person arena shooter, play minigames to earn rewards, or endlessly fight against hordes of enemies!

name: Dogs Can Speak English
description: Love in the digital age.

name: First Snow
description: On the day the first snow fell, I fell in love with her at first sight. The days when the first snow falls, she and I get closer... First Snow is a full-voice visual novel about a 20-year-old protagonist's first love.

name: Quiz Thiz United Kingdom
description: Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Zombie Defence TD
description: Zombie Defence TD is a tower defence shooter where humans fight off waves of invading zombies on a planet ravaged by an apocalyptic holocaust. You'll control different heroes with different skills to defeat the waves of invading zombies.

name: I Am Feeling Things Too
description: This game tells the story of Lydia and Ophelia - two lesbians who experience their first date in person, after they have been talking online for a while. The scene takes place in Ophelia's place, after having had a date on a café in i am feeling things.

name: Enlisted: Fedorov MG Squad
Avatar World
description: Avatar World full of fun adventures and mysteries, a magical world where you can fulfill and recreate any story that comes to your mind! Design and decorate your very own world and fill it with characters. There are no rules, make a copy of yourself or recreate your favorite character. It's up to you! Enjoy a new Avatar World with a huge variety of accessories that gives endless variations of styles.

name: Lost Lands: Sand Captivity - Collector's Edition
description:
Lift a mysterious curse, explore a fantasy world, and solve dozens of puzzles!

After the peace in the Lost Lands was restored, Susan decided to restore her own world. She had become a dedicated mother and a grandmother. All that reminded her of her previous adventures were the stories she told to her granddaughter under the guise of fairytales. But like mother, like son. Jim couldn’t walk by the artifact of the Lost Lands that was found on Earth. Accidentally, he unleashed an ancient curse. So now Susan has to return to the Lost Lands one more time to save her family.

Find a way to lift a mysterious curse with the help of the Lost Lands inhabitants, welcome familiar characters and meet the new ones to find solutions together with them!

name: Kunoichi: Sword of the Assassin
description: Sin descripción

name: Ragnarök TD
description: Ragnarök TD is a 2D top-down tower defense game created as a case study of Ninja Kiwi's Bloons TD 6 by the University of Michigan's WolverineSoft Studio. Follow the story of a small village in the North as they fend off the beasts of Ragnarök in this revamped Steam iteration of the original project.

name: In the Backrooms
description: "God save you if you hear something wandering around nearby, because it sure as hell has heard you.."

name: Fingerbang: All Bullets Pointin'
description: Fingerbang: All Bullets Pointin' is a fast-paced FPS inspired by both retro and modern FPS games. Fingerbang combines elements from each in order to create a mix of its own, with a scoring system added on top to gauge your performance through the different levels.

name: Hell Dungeons: The Lost Soul
description: Hell Dungeons, The Lost Souls is a dungeon maze game for you who like challenges and constantly overcome yourself. Whether it's after a stressful day at work and/or studies, it's a great game to relax and let go of all day-to-day tensions.

name: Hentai Pussy 5
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Slay the Zone
description: Face hundreds of monsters, upgrade your equipment and try to survive as long as you can. In this Action Roguelite choose from a variety of upgrades, unlock unique characters and create the best build to slaughter everyone in your path!

name: Cow Girl 2
description: Our farm is the best! Here you will find the most beautiful cows in the whole neighborhood. They bask in the sun all day long and enjoy fragrant herbs. I am sure you will get yourself the most beautiful cow, and she will give you a lot of milk in gratitude!

name: University Love Affair
description: University life is always interesting. It is full of romance, dreams and plans for the future. Derek Winters is a university student. Difficulties appeared on his way, having passed which he will be able to find harmony, love and everything he wants. His fate is in your hands. YOU can help him or...

name: Knocking Up My Nympho Neighbors
description: Take care of the residents of a dormitory for hard working women, who need to blow off steam after a long day at work. After all, home is where the harem is.

name: Christmas Stories: Taxi of Miracles - Collector's Edition
description: A tough year has put a damper on your town’s holiday cheer. With Christmas just around the corner, it’s up to you and a jolly cab driver named Nick to help townspeople in need and share the true meaning of Christmas with one and all!

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Class of Heroes 3 Collaboration: Additional Character Felpurr
description: Sin descripción

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Class of Heroes 3 Collaboration: Additional Character Dwarf
description: Sin descripción

name: Mojito the Cat: Christmas Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Preschoolers: Season 1 Christmas Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.3 Additional Character Lapis
description: Sin descripción

name: Volume 1-3 Complete DLC Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Freshman's Weapon Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Additional Content Vol.3 Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Additional Content Vol.2 Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Additional Content Vol.1 Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Action Games Bundle (5 in 1)
description: Check out our 5 action games in this awesome bundle!

name: Food Truck Tycoons: 2 in 1 Bundle
description: Jump into your food truck and business will bump up!

name: Gardens of Vextro
description: A chain game anthology by eight members of the Vextro community. Developed sequentially, with each game responding to all previous entries.

name: Super Beast Hunt
description: Super Beast Hunt is a platformer game featuring a hungry demon who must save the town from their diminishing supply of meat.

name: Coffee Fun
description: Coffee Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Path of Exile: Forbidden Sanctum
description:
In Path of Exile: The Forbidden Sanctum, you will test your resolve as you make your way through the Sanctum's dangerous halls. In the Sanctum, each decision you make can cost you greatly.

Our December expansion introduces the Sanctum challenge league and improvements to Path of Exile's endgame, alongside two new Skill Gems, seven new Vaal Skill Gems, over 15 new Unique Items, significant balance changes to jewels, hexes, monster modifiers, unique weapons and more. We are also proud to introduce Ruthless, an optional new way to play Path of Exile with extreme item scarcity.

name: There is a Genie in my Szechuan Sauce: Remastered
description:
"There is a Genie in my Szechuan Sauce Remastered" is a remaster of a game made in 2017.

This will be the most epic of throwback, relive all the best classic memes from 2014 through 2017 with this meme time capsule!

This is an interactive story featuring Jeff in his quest for the tasty and nasty Szechuan Sauce, when he finds out that his best friend Paul has it at his house, he literally walks to his house to get a taste! But Paul forgot to buy some tasty chicken nuggets... What will they do? Lick the sauce directly from the cup? No, ask a magic genie to give them some nuggies of course!

Relive this 2017 classic from Kimulator's Films in their first remaster of one of their first game ever!

name: The Jumping Gingerbread
description: Join Big G on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Rampage Ball 2048
description: "Rampage Ball 2048" is a classic Arkanoid game with RPG elements. Upgrade the ball and crush blocks.

name: Aroma
description: This is a simple story about young people, about the aroma of youth and the smells of life, which can so easily be cut short by a fatal accident.Or maybe at the behest of a heartless fate.

name: Sexual Summer
description: Sexual Summer - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Princess Ruby
description: Princess Ruby is a 2D Platformer aimed at young children. Play as a princess and run, jump and sometimes ride a unicorn through each level. Dress up how you want, change your hairstyle and the colors of your costume.

name: Tiny Detour
description: Tiny Detour is a little relaxing story about a Broken Bridge on your way home. Head to the nearby forest village and discover very weird locals. Experience the adventure & explore the beautiful parts of the valleys while completing unique quests!

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.3 Bonus Unit: Euclase
description: Description: Adds Euclase, a main character from the storyline, into the game as a playable character.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - New Adventure Volume 3: Linking Light's Successor 1-3
description: Description: A new adventure in the Shadowlands, featuring three brand new quests! Euclase and Lapis take center stage as main characters! What is the truth behind the new threat that looms over the entire continent?!

name: To Be or Not to Be
description: This is a text adventure game that combines the gameplay of desktop pets and mini-games. You can advance the plot by clicking on the dialogue, or play mini-games to accumulate values to trigger new plots, and you can also cultivate your favorite characters by hanging up.

name: My Mad Scientist Roommate Turned Me Into Her Personal Robotic Battle Maiden?!?
description: After being inadvertantly transformed into a robotic battle maiden by their criminially insane roommate, Sam is dragged along on a ridiculous adventure in a dimension full of ravenous monster girls. Will Sam find a way out of this mess and return to their original body? Probably not, but who knows!

name: Ocean Is Home
description: Ocean is Home is an island life simulator and an open world adventure rolled into one. Starting with a small house and an old pickup truck, you can build an estate and become a significant person in a warm tropical paradise.

name: Arcadie: Second-Born
description: In this interactive tale of love and war, carve a place for yourself in a world that has disregarded you for too long. Be the force of reason that your kingdom needs, or perpetuate its reputation as a force of destruction. Find love and weave friendships, or cast it away for the sake of retribution.

name: Fear & Hunger 2: Termina
description: Fear & Hunger 2: Termina is oppressive, relentless and hopeless. A mix of jRPG and Survival Horror. Turn-based combat meets resource management. 3 days to explore the wicked town of Prehevil and find out about its dark secrets. 3 days until the pale and sickly green moon rises at its apex. Termina is upon us!

name: Ghost Bus Simulator
description: This is the effect of the elixir of invisibility, which recently affected the city. In this game, you too came under the influence of this elixir without realizing it. But...Life goes on. In this bus simulator game, you as a bus driver, continue to do your job, going from station to station, knowing that people are waiting for you to come.

name: Osminog Adventures: The Lost Island
description:
Dive into the fantastical world of Karawark and accompany the Pirate Crew of The Osminog on an adventure they were not prepared for.
Exploration Sailing Party-Based RPG RPG

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.2 Challenge Quest: Danger Mountain March EX
description: Description: Adds a bonus challenge quest featuring an enhanced version of the boss encounter from Danger Mountain March. This quest does not include any story content.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.2 Bonus Unit: Lazuli
description: Description: Adds Lazuli, a main character from the storyline, into the game as a playable character.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.2 Bonus Unit: Kiesel
description: Description: Adds Kiesel, a main character from the storyline, into the game as a playable character.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - New Adventure Volume 2: Danger Mountain March 1- 3
description: Description: A new adventure in the Dia Earthlands, featuring three brand new quests! Kiesel and Lazuli take center stage as main characters! Just what kind of chaos unfolds as Lazuli undergoes a rigorous training regiment?

name: Sue Shi Survival
description: The ghosts of sea creatures you've slaughtered as a sushi chef are out for revenge. Survive the night by exterminating crowds of them for the second time in this survival roguelite!

name: Dragon Quest Treasures: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes Dragon Quest Treasures, three monster allies, and some consumable items for your journey:

- Main Game "Dragon Quest Treasures"
- Great Sabrecat (x1)
- Ruby Golem (x1)
- Icy Dragling (x1)
- Bestest Buddy Bullet (x25)
- Omniheal Bomb (x25)

name: Lazerball
description: 2-8 player brawler! Whack an electric dodgeball into your opponents! Jump, dodge, counter, curve & slam your way to victory! Play in teams or solo and become the Lazerball champion!

name: Aquarist Simulator VR
description: Get the best aquarium store in town! Create, renew, manage, observe. See if you can create an aquarium empire.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - New Adventure Volume 1: Super Special Dreamer 1-3
description: Description: A new adventure in the Sapphire Waterlands, featuring three brand new quests! Citrin and Spinel take center stage as main characters! Just what will become of the mysterious treasure hunt on the faraway island?
